title: Bug 35183DBCS: Set text generates Index of Bounds exception using 2.0 NLS language pack
description: Driver: RC2Java : Sun Java 1.3.107OS: SolarisLanguage: jaJPI got errors in the .log file during launching the WB with NLS languagepackage, and WB did not launch.Steps1. Extract the eclipseSDK.zip2. Extract the NLS Language package (eclipsenlsSDK2.0.x.zip) under the samedirectory3. Launch the eclipse (./eclipse vm /......)Then I got the error dialog and got errors in the .log file. WB startup failed.
